dmca.title: Unauthorized Publication / Copyright
dmca.body:
Admin/Tech:

A internet page that you host,
located at
www.mail-archive.com/ctrl@listserv.aol.com/msg32180.html
,
continues to publish a paper I authored, on
topic of mycoplasma disease, notwithstanding that I
have withdrawn any publication privilege and made
numerous express requests to depublish the paper;
Because it does not include
the important role of
other infections, the mycoplasma paper
is incomplete and misleading, and has undertaken
extensive revision since being created. In addition,
the published document has been edited, missing words
and other content, changing the original document.  In
accordance with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act,
and unless your customer removes the mycoplasma paper
without further delay, I must request that you take
action against the page, including preventing any
further unauthorized publication of the paper.
Peace, freedom and justice,
George Hylak, BS MS JD, POB 13042 Lansing, MI 48901
517-763-6471


The owner of an exclusive right should send to the
provider a notification containing the following
information:

1.  A physical or electronic signature of a person
authorized to act on
behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly
infringed.

>George Hylak

2.  Precise identification of the copyrighted work
claimed to have been
infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a
single online site are
covered by a single notification, a representative list
of such works at
that site.

>Paper - Mycoplasma & Public Health

3.  Identification of the material that is claimed to
be infringing or
to be the subject of infringing activity and that is to
be removed or
access to which is to be disabled, and information
reasonably sufficient
to permit the service provider to locate the material
including exact
URL's and references to specific files.


www.mail-archive.com/ctrl@listserv.aol.com/msg32180.html

4.  Information reasonably sufficient to permit the
service provider to
contact the complaining party, such as an address,
telephone number, and
, if available, and electronic mail address at which
the complaining
party may be contacted.

>George Hylak
>POB 13042
>Lansing, MI  48901
>517-763-6471
>GHylak@justice.com

5.  A statement that the complaining party has a good
faith belief that
use the of the material in the manner complained of is
not authorized by
the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

>I, George Hylak, have a good faith belief that
>use the of the material in the manner complained of
>is not authorized by the copyright owner (myself),
>its agent, or the law.

6.  A statement that the information in the
notification is accurate,and under penalty of perjury,
that the complaining party is authorized
to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right is
allegedly infringed.

>The information in this notification is accurate,
>and under penalty of perjury, I am authorized
>to act on behalf of the owner (myself) of the
>exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

_________________________________________________
